title: What's New in Rounds

features.title: Global Leaderboard
features.description: Compete with medical students worldwide! See rankings by school and climb to the top.

features.title: Challenge Friends
features.description: Share cases directly with friends via deep links. They can play the exact same case!

features.title: Streak Freezes
features.description: Pro users get weekly streak freezes to protect their progress when life gets busy.

features.title: Redesigned Home
features.description: Fresh new look with easier navigation. Swipe between Play, Progress, and More tabs.

footer: Thanks for playing Rounds! Your feedback helps us improve.
